name: Holo AT (EA13) [PC & Android]
description:
INTRODUCTION

This is a unoffical fangame(PROTOTYPE phase) inspired by Hololive official youtube video (below), featuring with Hololive talent Kazama iroha(bodyguard in HoloX) fighting with other talents.

In the prototype, players aim to beat BOSS as quickly as they can to reach the top rankings.

FEATURES

a. Challenge 3 hololive talents

b. Unique BOSS strategy in different states

c. Leaderboard records quickest time when player beat boss

d. Single player or private multiplayer modes

*Rankings will be different  for different BOSS in different mode (Single player or multiplayer mode). 

*Rankings will be RESET in prototype phase.

OFFICIAL REFFERENCE KEYBINDS

PC:

Movement: W, S, A, D

Lock: TAB

Sprint: Left shift

Dodge: Space bar

Light attack: Click Mouse left button

Heavy attack: Press Mouse left button

Sprint attack: Mouse left button when sprinting

Android:

According to virtual pad buttons.

NOTICE

Beware that it is a solo-game PROTOTYPE including single and multiplayer conents(Leaderboard and private session modules) for Android and PC platforms. you need to connect stable internet during game to enable those multiplayer features. (Make sure to download latest version!)

If you like it, please consider to support it for further development.
